transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMPDataReadDL
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DeptDataReadDL
MapDrifted1, MapDrifted2 lookup(empno == deptno,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupEmpAndDept
EMPDataReadDL derive(empno = toString(byName('empno')),
		ename = toString(byName('ename'))) ~> MapDrifted1
DeptDataReadDL derive(deptno = toString(byName('deptno')),
		dname = toString(byName('dname'))) ~> MapDrifted2
LookupEmpAndDept select(mapColumn(
		empno,
		ename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(LoadedDate = currentUTC()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		movie_title as string,
		actor_name as string,
		director_name as string,
		gross as integer,
		duration as integer,
		num_critic_for_reviews as integer,
		num_voted_users as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> SinkDBEMPWrite
